H0.text: In which London magazine did Sherlock Holmes first appear. The Illustrated London News

H1.text: In which London magazine did Sherlock Holmes first appear. The Graphic

H2.text: In which London magazine did Sherlock Holmes first appear. Cassell's Magazine

H3.text: In which London magazine did Sherlock Holmes first appear. Strand

A4.text: The Sherlock Holmes short stories by Arthur Conan Doyle were first published in The Strand in the UK.
